What do i need to do to my roms #1-1700 to sync with these new releases?

The checksums are alright; you need to rename + repack them though (if you want the new numbering for the old roms as well).

Renaming is easiest with clrmame (Google's your friend!) using the releaselist on http://www.advanscene.com/, and then you rename the roms with 7-Zip and the scripts found in the comments of my earlier torrents.

Cheers!
//joda

I'm not sure if this would be the right pack (it's within the date range of the games), but Tadashii Kakitori-kun: Kondo wa Kanken Taisaku Dayo (http://www.gametrailers.com/game/5875.html#userreviews) seems to be missing. I could be completely wrong because I don't know how the numbering scheme goes, but... Just a heads up if I'm right ^_^ And thanks once again for the awesome pack!

All are there. Check the releaselist on: http://www.advanscene.com/
//joda
